description:
While the Full Moon Festival is approaching, Gravi`s Hajime Mutsuki is as busy as ever with work. Among his jobs is a photo series for MythxKiss, a women`s cosmetic brand he has promoted as an image character for years. During a meeting, the brand offers Hajime a hand modeling job for nail polish. Hajime has never paid his hands any particular attention or care... They`re the hands he was born with. However, despite receiving so many compliments from the people around him, Hajime is at a aloss.
"Tell me. What`s so great about these hands?"
What do those hands create...?
Source: crunchyroll
